name: @julian-i/try-error
description: Elegant tuple-based error handling utilities for TypeScript, inspired by Rust's Result<T, E> pattern.

scripts.tag: git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push origin v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.deploy:beta: echo "Have you bumped the version in package.json?" && read -p "Press enter to continue..." && npm run build && npm run test:run && git add . && git commit -m "chore: deploy beta v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git push origin main
scripts.deploy:release: echo "Have you bumped the version in package.json?" && read -p "Press enter to continue..." && npm run build && npm run test:run && git add . && git commit -m "chore: release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && npm run tag

author: Julian I
